seed_pair.known: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
seed_pair.target: Queremos reunirnos a las seis esta noche.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 STRICT GATE compliance
curation_metadata.gate_compliance_note: Regenerated with strict GATE compliance - only exact Spanish forms taught in LEGOs through S0017
